summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 30000rpm Professional Electric Nail Drill Machine Pedicure Manicure Kits Nail File Drill with Sanding Bands, Nail Salon Art Tools Review Date: 2018/03/30 Store: SUBAY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 5.3 x 3.7 inches; 3.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SUB3Z', 'UPC': '602668590901'} Review Text: This nail drill is awesome! I got it right on time, started using it right away, have used it like 6 times since, it works great. To me it's an upgrade after what I got at Sally's. Love love love it! Review Title: This nail drill is awesome! I got it right on time Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SNS Dipping Powder Vitamin Oil .5oz Review Date: 2018/04/28 Store: SNS Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 1.89 x 1.54 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Bergotti'} Review Text: This cuticle oil is amazing! It's got a very gentle, light nice scent to it. I love it! Review Title: Awesome Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 100 'Edge' Style of Well-less French Acrylic Artificial False Salon Nail Tips White Review Date: 2018/07/02 Store: ALLTOP Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ALLTOP', 'Style': 'French', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} Review Text: I haven't tried them yet because I'm not sure I'd be able to put acrylic over edge correctly but they do look like what I wanted. Thank you as Review Title: Look great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Misaki - Kolinsky Acrylic Nail Brush Powder For Manicure and Pedicure - Size #10 (Crimped) Review Date: 2018/12/27 Store: MISAKI Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MISAKI', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 0.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: My brush did not come in a box like some pictures show, just in a plastic container. I used it today for the first time. Now, let me tell you, it takes me a while to know if I like a brush or not. To get used to it. I have some very good brushes but this one just beat them all! I love it! It is my definitely favorite brush! It's very high quality, holds its shape perfectly, acrylic doesn't get stuck in it.. It is by far the best brush I've ever used. I will recommend it to all my nail tech friends and will get a bunch of them as soon as I can just to make sure I'm good on brushes. And in case they quit selling them.

By the way, the fact that it's short is a plus in my book. That way I'm not worried that I'm gonna get it in my customer's eye when I'm brushing the acrylic back to the cuticle area. And it fits perfectly in my hand. Review Title: Perfect. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: PrettyDiva 1g Holographic Powder Rainbow Unicorn Chrome Nails Powder Manicure Pigment Top Grade Review Date: 2019/05/11 Store: Pretty Diva Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.01 x 1.61 x 0.39 inches; 0.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701630344631', 'Manufacturer': 'Pretty Diva'} Review Text: This holographic powder is amazing! Whoever says it doesn't work is probably not doing it right. If you rub it with an eyeshadow applicator over a NO WIPE top coat, it works and looks amazing! Review Title: Best powder ever! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MIZHSE 18ml e.61OZ Black Gel Nail Polish and White Gel Nail Polish, Soak Off UV LED Gel Polish Varnish Manicure Kit 2PCS Review Date: 2019/12/14 Store: MIZHSE Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.2 Fl Oz', 'Liquid Volume': '0.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 3.4 x 1.6 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I put an orange wood stick in to check the fullness. Just under half of the bottle. And keep in mind that orange wood sticks are pretty thick, so it pushed some of the polish up, too. So a third at best. Review Title: Not 18 ml! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TOMICCA Bright Colors Gel Nail Polish Set UV LED Gel Polish Kit 6 Color Silver Gold Pink Soak Off Gel Nail Polish Review Date: 2020/01/27 Store: TOMICCA Holy Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TOMICCA Holy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '5 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4.2 x 1.6 inches; 8.47 Ounces'} Review Text: The colors are so beautiful! I love how every color has different sized glitter already in it, it's very beautiful. Two very thin coats cover the nail perfectly. Also, these polishes are awesome for ombre! So easy! Review Title: Beautiful! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has had several positive experiences, showcasing a clear preference for high-quality products. They express strong satisfaction with the performance of various tools, indicating that some items have become favorites due to their exceptional quality and effectiveness. The user appreciates the timely delivery of products, as this enhanced their overall experience. Positive sentiments are particularly evident regarding the ease of use, effectiveness, and pleasing scents of products, which contributed to a fulfilling shopping experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Despite the overall positive trend, the user did encounter some negative experiences. A significant issue arose with one product that was not as advertised, leading to disappointment regarding the quantity received. Additionally, there was dissatisfaction related to the packaging of a product, as it did not meet the user's expectations based on visual representations. These negative experiences highlight a potential inconsistency in product delivery and packaging standards.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping history reflects a generally positive experience, with several products receiving high praise for quality, performance, and delivery. However, there are notable negative aspects, particularly related to one instance of misleading product quantity and dissatisfaction with packaging. Overall, while the user enjoys their purchases and appreciates effective products, there are areas where improvements could enhance the shopping experience, indicating a mix of satisfaction and room for growth.

target_interaction.title: Awesome
target_interaction.text: Omg! I can't believe I still haven't reviewed these! The price is amazing for the quality and quantity! I knew there was a lot of wipes in the package but once I opened it, I realized this will last me a good while. Will definitely buy more.
target_interaction.title_meta: 3000Pcs Nail Pliosh Remover Wipes Pure Cotton Lint Free Wipes Removal Gel Polish Nail Cleaner Nail Napkins Absorbable (3000Pcs)
